meanings.definition: A plate at the heel of a shoe to provide support and protection.
meanings.sent1: The heelplate of the shoe kept my heel stable.
meanings.sent2: She replaced the worn-out heelplate on her favorite boots.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy mistook the heelplate for a chew toy.
meanings.sent4: The heelplate of the shoe acted like a shield for her heel.
meanings.sent5: The shiny heelplate gleamed under the bright lights of the store.

meanings.definition: A metal plate at the heel of a firearm to absorb recoil.
meanings.sent1: The soldier's rifle had a sturdy heelplate to reduce kickback.
meanings.sent2: The gunsmith recommended adding a heelplate to the shotgun.
meanings.sent3: During target practice, the heelplate reflected the sunlight into the shooter's eyes.
meanings.sent4: The heelplate on the rifle absorbed the impact like a cushion.
meanings.sent5: The engraved heelplate added a touch of elegance to the firearm.

meanings.definition: A plate at the heel of a ski binding to secure the boot.
meanings.sent1: Before skiing, make sure the heelplate is properly adjusted.
meanings.sent2: The ski instructor tightened the heelplate to keep the boot in place.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to hide its acorn in the ski heelplate.
meanings.sent4: The heelplate locked the boot securely onto the ski binding.
meanings.sent5: The colorful heelplate contrasted with the white snow on the mountain.
